author: Rebecca Rubin
title: Tom Holland’s ‘Uncharted’ Tops Box Office Charts With $44 Million Debut - Variety
description: Popular on Variety Sony’s long-in-the-works video game adaptation “Uncharted” collected $44.1 million between Friday and Sunday, enough to lead domestic box office charts and solidify Tom Holland’s star power. The big-budget action adventure has been position…
content:
